channel.title: [PI] Need help
channel.description: Hello, when other player's try to log into my server it says Error Connecting To Server, but i can log in fine please help, if it's portfowarding can you leave me a good guide link.

item.title: [PI] Need help
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“crazyfazespy, post:10, topic:433378”][quote author=Slayerscape101 link=topic=536098.msg3919728#msg3919728 date=1329596437]

yeah, port 0.0.0.0 is the same as 127.0.0.1. Its the Local Host. change it to your No-IP and try again.

On the server i changed it to mine, then i went to the server.java in the source and changed it to mine but it still says its running on 0.0.0.0 can you tell me how to change it?
[/quote]
lol no u dont need change that, youy need change ip at client only open client.java file press ctrl +h its may be to u (g or f) then type “server =” and press search once you find it change server = 127.0.0.1 to urs ip to find out what is ur ip go here http://whatismyipaddress.com/ and u see ur ip IP Information: ...
then compile ur client if its says error conecting to server then search for portfoward guide lol[/quote]

…you can also put in your no-ip in there. My guess is you have no clue what port forwarding is, and you messed it up. search this site for a guide there are like 9000 on here alone.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Need help

item.description:

yeah, port 0.0.0.0 is the same as 127.0.0.1. Its the Local Host. change it to your No-IP and try again.
[/quote]
On the server i changed it to mine, then i went to the server.java in the source and changed it to mine but it still says its running on 0.0.0.0 can you tell me how to change it?[/quote]
lol no u dont need change that, youy need change ip at client only open client.java file press ctrl +h its may be to u (g or f) then type “server =” and press search once you find it change server = 127.0.0.1 to urs ip to find out what is ur ip go here http://whatismyipaddress.com/ and u see ur ip IP Information: ...
then compile ur client if its says error conecting to server then search for portfoward guide lol

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Need help
item.dc:creator: @Slayerscape101 Slayerscape101
item.description:
@Slayerscape101 wrote:

when i run the server it say’s " Listening on port: 0.0.0.0:43594" do i need to change the 0.0.0.0 to mine? if so how. And idk if i portfowarded right i made the descrpition moparscape and the port 43594 on my router

Read full topic
